attributes.action: "Ban the teaching of the existence of a god in all state schools."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The response to 'Ban The Existance of a god in all State Schools' was a side-step in addressing the real issue. Yes - teaching children the differences between religions and their relationship to the rest of humanity is a good thing. But! The main idea was petitioning against faith-based schools totally - you have not answered the question as to how we can implement schools for schools sake - purely education not superstition.
